overview: In 2040 "real" porn stars are all but a thing of the past and in it's place special androids, called Anabots, are taking their place. During a scene with one of the last human performers a newly developed prototype performs beyond expectations and begins to feel and act like a real human. Its existence is soon in danger when the hunt starts to gain control of her and uncover her secrets.
tagline: A Chilling Vision of the Future of Sex
